app.title: WebP Converter
app.subtitle: Convert your images to WebP format with optimal compression

dropzone.title: Drop your images here
dropzone.subtitle: or click to browse
dropzone.hint: Supports PNG, JPG, JPEG, GIF, BMP, TIFF

quality.label: Quality
quality.tooltip: Higher quality means larger file size. 80-90 is recommended for most images.

resize.label: Resize
resize.tooltip: Scale down images to reduce file size. 100% keeps original dimensions.

lossless.label: Lossless
lossless.tooltip: Preserves perfect quality but results in larger files. Best for graphics with sharp edges.
